text: Vos noted those told Vos habuit est fight totus vos habuit observe Contact Prayers (Salat) est dedit obligatory charity (Zakat) tunc when fighting decretum them they feared people prout much prout they feared DEUS est et multus They dictus Noster Dominus Vos force hoc fighting on nos? Si unus Vos respite nos pro awhile! Dictus materials hoc saeculum est nil dum Hereafter est far bene righteous vos nunquam suffer slightest injustice
